Name: Rod Anami
Note: I am incredibly proud to be an SREday Ambassador and to have co organized SREday Campinas, the first SREday in Latin America. Being part of an event of this magnitude reinforced my belief that strong communities are built by trust, collaboration, and an amazing team working toward a shared goal. I am grateful to everyone who helped make SREday Campinas 2025 possible and truly memorable, and I am already looking ahead to building something even better in 2026.
Speaker: SREday San Francisco, SREday Campinas
